\n
Work Arrangements: On-Site (Monday-Friday)
\n
\n
At Precision Drilling, our mission is to deliver safe, sustainable, and high-performance drilling solutions that reduce risks and optimize resources for our customers across global markets. Driven by our Core Values, we empower our people, invest in cutting-edge technology, and foster lasting relationships built on integrity, collaboration, and an unwavering pursuit of excellence.
\n
\n
CULTURE:
\n
Precision Drilling promotes a strong safety culture through our "Target Zero" initiative, emphasizing employee well-being and environmental responsibility. We support career growth through robust training and development, encouraging innovation and collaboration. With competitive benefits, a casual work environment, generous time-off policies, and a culture grounded in respect and integrity, we create a workplace where people feel empowered and valued.
\n
\n
DAY IN THE LIFE:
\n
\n
Standardize and oversee drill pipe management, including inspections, repairs, transportation, inventory control, and asset integrity
\n
Maintain accurate drill pipe data in SAP and asset systems; provide user training and support
\n
Coordinate drill pipe inventory, scheduling, and movement across rigs and storage locations to meet operational needs
\n
Collaborate with Rig Managers, Field Superintendents, Billing, Sales, and Tubular teams to share data, technical details, and wear calculations
\n
Perform administrative, analytical, and continuous improvement activities, including invoicing/POs, data analysis, and 24-hour on-call support
\n
\n
\n
WHAT WE NEED FROM YOU:
\n
\n
University/college degree or equivalent experience; technical diploma considered an asset
\n
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to clearly present findings verbally and in writing
\n
High attention to detail with a focus on data accuracy, integrity, and well-documented processes
\n
Strong problem-solving, organizational, and time-management skills; self-motivated and adaptable
\n
Intermediate to advanced Microsoft Excel proficiency and a commitment to continuous process and reporting improvement
\n
\n
